**/dist/**
**/*.exe
**/tmp/**

**/.idea/**
**/.vscode/**
**/.vs/**
**/*.swp
**/*.swo

# OS generated files
**/.DS_Store
**/.DS_Store?
**/._*
**/.Spotlight-V100
**/.Trashes
**/ehthumbs.db
**/Thumbs.db

# Logs and temporary files
**/*.log
**/logs/**
**/temp/**
**/tmp/**

# Test cache
**/*.test
**/*.out

**/.coverage

# Environment and sensitive files

**/.env.*

**/*.pem
